directDebit.title: Direct Debit Setup
directDebit.subtitle: Set up automatic payments with ZarinPal
directDebit.setupDescription: Set up automatic billing with ZarinPal's secure direct debit system
directDebit.secureDescription: This process creates a secure contract with ZarinPal that allows automatic billing for your subscriptions. Your banking information is handled directly by your bank and ZarinPal.

directDebit.redirectingMessage: Please wait while we redirect you to your bank's secure website to complete the contract signing process.
directDebit.mobileHelperText: Iranian mobile number (required for contract signing)
directDebit.nationalIdHelperText: Optional but recommended for enhanced security
directDebit.bankSelectionDescription: Please select your bank to sign the direct debit contract. You'll be redirected to your bank's secure website.

directDebit.agreeToTerms: I agree to the direct debit terms and conditions
directDebit.error: Failed to create direct debit contract
directDebit.cancelConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel your direct debit contract? This will stop all automatic payments.

step1.description: Setup a secure direct debit contract with your mobile number and national ID

step2.title: 2. Sign with Bank

step3.title: 3. Auto-billing Active
